t: Nike Sales Collapse Forces 'Woke' Mega-Brand to Make Amazon U-Turn | Truth Press
s: 2 weeks ago - America’s most popular shoe is coming back to Amazon. After a five-year hiatus, Nike shoes, clothing, and accessories are returning to the e-commerce giant. The athletic brand swiped its products from the platform in 2019, as part of a push to sell more directly to consumers.
